StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [M8412_Comment_Add_Delete]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonID INT , @Comment VARCHAR(150) =null , @UserID varchar(15) =null AS set nocount on
DECLARE @count INT DECLARE @SeqNo INT SET @SeqNo=0
IF EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 Person_ID FROM M8412_Comment WHERE Person_ID=@PersonID) SELECT @SeqNo =MAX(Sequence_No) + 1 FROM M8412_Comment WHERE Person_ID=@PersonID Else SET @SeqNo=1
INSERT INTO M8412_Comment VALUES ( @PersonID , @SeqNo , @Comment , GETDATE() , @UserID )
SELECT @count = count(*) FROM M8412_Comment WHERE Person_ID=@PersonID IF (@count > 5) BEGIN SELECT @SeqNo =MIN(Sequence_No) FROM M8412_Comment WHERE Person_ID=@PersonID
DELETE FROM M8412_Comment WHERE Person_ID=@PersonID AND Sequence_No=@SeqNo END
set nocount o.
